scripts.start: export MONGOHOST=$(kubectl get nodes --namespace default -o jsonpath='{.items[0].status.addresses[0].address}'); export MONGOPORT=$(kubectl get svc --namespace default dbtest-ibm-mongodb-dev -o jsonpath='{.spec.ports[0].nodePort}'); export MONGOPASSWORD=$(kubectl get secret --namespace default dbtest-ibm-mongodb-dev -o jsonpath='{.data.password}' | base64 --decode; echo); nodemon server.js
scripts.dev: export MONGOHOST=$(kubectl get nodes --namespace default -o jsonpath='{.items[0].status.addresses[0].address}'); export MONGOPORT=$(kubectl get svc --namespace default dbtest-ibm-mongodb-dev -o jsonpath='{.spec.ports[0].nodePort}'); export MONGOPASSWORD=$(kubectl get secret --namespace default dbtest-ibm-mongodb-dev -o jsonpath='{.data.password}' | base64 --decode; echo); nodemon server.js
